mapper.select: SELECT vmp.permission_id AS permission_id, vmp.application_id AS application_id, vmp.parent_id AS parent_id, vmp.name AS name, vmp.permission AS permission, vmp.description AS description, vmp.url AS url, vmp.method AS method, vmp.status AS status FROM gar_v_menu_permission vmp WHERE menu_id = #{menuId};
